TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebAdministrationService

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for creating services for administering a Web site at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The specified arguments can be used to specify how the Web administration user interface (UI) should be launched. The arguments are optional and the design host can choose to ignore them.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Start(class System.Collections.IDictionary arguments) cil managed

Docs.summary: Starts the Web administration facility in the design host.
